channel.title: HydraScapeHD | The Best 639 Runescape Emulator | Custom Additions | Join Now
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/1zzknle.png[/img]
[SIZE="4"][SIZE="3"]HydraScapeHD is a brand new 639 RuneScape Emulator that is soon to be a leading server in the RSPS' scene, the server is owned by a group of highly professional developers that have over 15 years of experience between them, the features they add are 100% unique and this is what makes the server different from every other RSPS that is just a leech.[/SIZE][/SIZE]
[URL=http://"http://hydrascapehd.com/game.php"][IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/nez0ht.png[/img][/URL]
[SIZE="4"]Some important links:[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/dq4pqc.png[/img][URL=http://"http://forum.hydrascapehd.com/index.php?app=core&module=global&section=register"]Click here to register a forum account![/URL] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2uffvxv.png[/img][URL=http://"http://forum.hydrascapehd.com/"]HydraScapeHD Forums[/URL] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2uffvxv.png[/img][URL=http://"http://forum.hydrascapehd.com/index.php?/forum/81-troubleshooting-technical-issues/"]If you have any trouble with the client please click here[/URL] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/rs6aly.png[/img][URL=http://"http://hydrascapehd.com/game.php"]HydraScapeHD Downloadable Client[/URL][/CENTER]
[SIZE="4"][CENTER]We have a very dedicated team of developers and managers who strive to produce the best experience for the players, they spend countless hours perfecting everything from quests to combat, from skills to bosses and nothing is ever unfinished.
Unlike most servers, the HydraScapeHD developers and managers listen to their players, if someone has an idea and they post it, it will definitely be looked over by the team and they will contemplate whether it should be added or not, every single person who is part of the community has a voice and no one goes without, we look after our players and this is the reason we have so many loyal veterans who have returned.[/CENTER][/SIZE]
[CENTER][SIZE="5"]The Developers and Managers of HydraScapeHD.[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/34hgvuv.png[/img][B][COLOR="Red"]Hydra[/COLOR][/B] - Has owned many servers in the past such as Synthex/RuneWar/Enchanta - all have been successful and this server will not disappoint. [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/34hgvuv.png[/img][COLOR="red"][B]Nmopal[/B][/COLOR] - Has been part of every server that 'Hydra' has released and never leaves a stone unturned, everything is done to perfections - especially forum related features! [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/34hgvuv.png[/img][B][COLOR="red"]Luke[/COLOR][/B] - Also, has been behind the scenes of every server 'Hydra' has made and always strives to get everything done to it's highest level and keeps the community in shape.
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2sb5nyf.png[/img][B][COLOR="Purple"]Cowboy Joe[/COLOR][/B] - Similar to the Managers, Cowboy Joe has been part of every server and has been around for a long time, working behind the scenes again he likes to produce new content to keep the server alive and exciting. [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2sb5nyf.png[/img][B][COLOR="Purple"]Etoke[/COLOR][/B] - Etoke has been around for the least amount of time but has had a big impact on the server(s) - he adds content very frequently and likes to keep the server fresh by adding new items and features daily.
[SIZE="4"]Hydrascape HD - Runescape returned to 2011 Hydrascape is a 2011 RS Emulator on a 639 Revision packed with features built on a custom game engine.[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://hydrascapehd.com/private/pub/resources/shield-drag.png[/img]
[SIZE="3"]Features list[/SIZE]
100% CONSTRUCTION DUNGEONEERING GOD WARS BARROWS SUMMONING CLUE SCROLLS HUNTER ACTIVE PKING PVP STATS CLAN CHAT TONS OF SLAYER TASKS DOZENS OF BOSSES QUICK TELEPORT MENUS CUSTOM MINIGAMES [/CENTER] [SIZE="3"][/SIZE]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iRZPDCa.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[SIZE="3"][CENTER][CENTER]SMOOTH GAMEPLAY | FAST PING WORLDWIDE | DDOS PROTECTED & LOAD BALANCED | INSTANT VOTE REWARDS | IPB FORUM[/CENTER][/SIZE]
[URL=http://"http://forum.hydrascapehd.com/index.php?app=core&module=global&section=register"][IMG]http://hydrascapehd.com/private/pub/misc/signup.jpg[/img][/URL]
[SIZE="3"][CENTER]25+ complete skills to achieve and there's even the completionist cape![/CENTER][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5jgSb9i.jpg[/img]
[SIZE="3"]All of your favourite skills brougt back to 2011 including Slayer, Summoning, Construction and more![/SIZE]
[SIZE="5"]CONTENT PACKED
TEAM DUNGEONEERING | CLAN FEATURES | CHAMPIONS CHALLENGE | FIGHT CAVES[/SIZE]
[SIZE="5"]Fully working treasure trails with chests![/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yFc1SRu.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rAnQjiC.jpg[/img]
[SIZE="5"]Precise scripts!
Stop wasting time with servers that the doors don't even work!
Accurate Animations | Working Sound Effects | Graphic Effects[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CMP3qKt.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]Many different locations to train agility! (Making the most boring skill entertaining!)[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6zcthsv.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]Slayer rewards![/SIZE]
[SIZE="5"]All Monsters Coded| All Slayer Equipment | Slayer Helms | Cancel and Block Certain Tasks | Spend Points in Custom Shop[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5mUjMJY.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]Puro Puro - Just one of many minigames we offer already![/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xyZNwtw.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]Fully working customization & Makeover mage![/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ijrnIoQ.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]Power through the economy with skills such as Hunter![/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hVfhQzx.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]Fully working bank tabs![/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lWhl3CR.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]Working barrows minigame with good rewards![/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UlPCZqU.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]Fully working duel arena with everything working for your staking needs![/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FoebtmX.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PTlBgwi.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]A great thieving plaza and a selection of different chests that offer amazing rewards![/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CU0yNxw.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6LPhMAW.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]Fully working summoning with all creatures available! Even a pack-yak![/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7Q9f3N9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NJyBIGl.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]Fully working enchanting! All your bolts can be enchanted![/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bd8hCI7.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]Fully working farming![/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SEwGmQJ.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]Fully working construction! Boxing rings, altars - everything works![/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gEq45ZV.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Q9bTn8T.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]What else do we offer? Come check us out and see everything for yourself![/SIZE]
[SIZE="3"]RANDOM EVENTS CUSTOM CLUE SCROLLS CUSTOM QUESTS TZHAAR TRAINING AREA & TOKKUL REWARDS INFERNO ADZE VINE WHIP STEADFAST/ GLAIVENS / RAGEFIRE BOOTS PEST CONTROL MUCH MUCH MORE+[/SIZE] [/CENTER]
